price: Wala wasidhanie wale walio kufuru kwamba wao wametangulia mbele. La, wao hawatashinda.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ
footnotes: Wala wasidhani walio kufuru kuwa wamekwisha tangulia na wameiepuka adhabu ya kukhuni kwao na kwenda kinyume! Wao kabisa hawatamshinda Mwenyezi Mungu asiwazunguke na kuwatia nguvuni, bali Yeye peke yake ni Muweza, na atawalipa kwa nguvu zake na uadilifu wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
